00052         const std::string update( const RmUtility::MappedSonarReading &mr ) {
00053                 return update( mr.reading );
00054         }
00055         // This method is provided as means for RmGlobalMap to pass on a mapped reading
00056         // to RmBayesCertaintyGrid so that the BCG doesn't have to recalculate the mapped reading;
00057         // however, RmLocalMap deals in plain RmSonarReadings for now, so it strips off
00058         // the mapped portion, passes that on to BCG, which must then recalculate the mapped reading.
